name: TG File Sharing Bot
description: file sharing bot store posts and it can access by special links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

APP_ID.description: your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_SUB_GROUP.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_SUB_VIRAL.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

START_MESSAGE.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
START_MESSAGE.value: Halo Cuk {} Bot Ini Berfungsi untuk Menyimpan File dan Membagikannya dalam Bentuk Link. Untuk Mengakses File Tinggal Klik Link yang dibagikan dari Bot ini Lalu Klik Start. ✨ Bot ini Dibuat oleh : @imgoriorio 𝗧𝗲𝗸𝗮𝗻 /help 𝘂𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗸 𝗺𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝗯𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘂𝗮𝗻.

CPT_SATU.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

CPT_DUA.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

CPT_TIGA.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

START_IMG.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

URL_VIRAL.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

URL_GROUP.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

ADMINS.description: A space separated list of user_ids of Admins, they can only create links
